name: weather-service-benchmark
description: Performance benchmark for Weather Service HTTP vs gRPC

scripts.test:all: npm run quick && npm run comprehensive
scripts.start: echo Weather Service Benchmark Suite Available commands: && echo   npm run quick        - Quick benchmark 2-3 min && echo   npm run comprehensive - Full benchmark 5-10 min && echo   npm run high-load     - High load simulation 1000 concurrent && echo   npm run load-test     - Production load test 1000 RPS && echo   npm run benchmark    - Original stress test && echo   npm run test:all     - Run all tests && echo   npm run clean        - Clean result files
